#summary How to use Android ROME Feed Reader
#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy

= Maven =

Add the Maven repository hosted on Google Code to your project's pom.xml:

{{{
<repositories>
  <repository>
    <id>android-rome-feed-reader-repository</id>
    <name>Android ROME Feed Reader Repository</name>
    <url>https://android-rome-feed-reader.googlecode.com/svn/maven2/releases</url>
  </repository>
</repositories>
}}}

Then add this dependency to your project's pom.xml:

{{{
<dependency>
  <groupId>com.google.code.android-rome-feed-reader</groupId>
  <artifactId>android-rome-feed-reader</artifactId>
  <version>1.0.0</version>
</dependency>
}}}

= Ant =

Manually download the feed reader jar from the [download page http://code.google.com/p/android-rome-feed-reader/downloads/list]. You will also need to download [JDOM 1.0 http://www.jdom.org/]. Add these to your project's libraries and you're good to go.
